name: Wastelanders Ming
description:
This game is currently in development right now, feel free to try the demo.

In 1351 the red turban revolt erupted in Yuan China. The revolt grew in popularity and eventually the rebels established a new dynasty called the Ming Dynasty. There grew a massive empire that's vast and rich.  In this game you'll be playing as generals and fight battles against enemies of the Ming. The fate of Ming rest in how you defeat your enemies.
